comments:
Manual tests run OK, but URL tests do not run properly on the IAC with 4.3 I-2 install or an install from today (9/26) of TPTP.

On my Windows XP machine, after trying many times, I consistently get a 60 second delay followed by the TestExecutionHarnessExecutorStub stub then throwing an InactiveProcessException after waitForProcess times out.  I have observed that session JVM kicks off the runner java.exe with the correct arguments and is left as an orphaned process after the exception is thrown and the session JVM terminates.

Hi, 
I beleive this error is cuased by the relocation of SituationType.

Originally it was in:
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.SituationType

It has now been moved to:
org.eclipse.tptp.logging.events.cbe.SituationType

It should just be a matter of changing the import statement, and pointing to the new package which contains the class file.
added Joe Toomey to CC list.

Unless I have misunderstood something, this is an API breakage, and should be corrected in 4.3 ASAP.  There was much discussion about repackaging CBE code into different jars in 4.3, but it was never discussed that we would change the java package structure.  4.3 isn't an API breaking release, and this code is not in an internal package, so we are not allowed to change the package structure.  I'm sure URL test will not be the only consumer broken by this type of change.

I'm not sure Samson is the right owner for this.  If not, who should own it?

If I'm missing something, please let me know.  Thanks.

(In reply to comment #3)

When the Common Base Event implementations were split into the org.eclipse.tptp.platform.logging.events plugin, the package structure did not change.  The org.eclipse.hyades.logging.events.cbe.* package contains the EMF Common Base Event implementation and the org.eclipse.tptp.logging.events.cbe.* package contains the non-EMF Common Base Event implementation.  I would suggest the plugin calling the Common Base Event implementation does not have the correct org.eclipse.tptp.platform.logging.events depednacy.  From an API perspective, nothing is broken.
Thay is working on this, so assigning to him and CCing Samson.  Raised priority and set target to 4.3 i2.
Raising severity to blocker, since the problem is now the same with the AC and the IAC.  I can run against a 9/20 AC but none of the later drivers.

IAC's dependancies have been modified to use org.eclipse.tptp.platform.logging.events.  

Samson, checked in the fix.

The "org.eclipse.hyades.test.tools.core" config is missing a reference to the classpath of "org.eclipse.tptp.platform.logging.events". The extra fix is to add this line to the config file:

<Variable name="CLASSPATH" position="append" value="%CLASSPATH_ORG_ECLIPSE_TPTP_PLATFORM_LOGGING_EVENTS%"/>

Fix checked into CVS 2006/10/06 12:51 EDT
- pluginconfig.xml for "org.eclipse.hyades.test.tools.core"

I just verifed the fix with the internal build:
TPTP-4.3.0-200610061346
